Magic Notes:
Magic Initiate (Druid): Knows 2 D0 spells/May cast chosen D1 spell 1/long rest
Artisan's Blessing: May use Channel Divinity to craft in 1 hr a metal item worth up to 100 GP
Blessing Of The Forge: Touched weapon or armor gains a +1 bonus until next long rest 1/long rest
Circle Of Mortality: Cure spells have maximum effect for HP 0 targets/May cast R30' Spare The Dying
Divine Intervention: 100% chance to gain help from deity 1/wk
Elemental Adept (Acid): Acid spells ignore resistance and treat 1s as 2s on damage dice
Elemental Adept (Lightning): Lightning spells ignore resistance and treat 1s as 2s on damage dice
Eyes Of The Grave: R60' May detect undead for 1 rd 4/long rest
Keeper Of Souls: R60' May cause a foe's death to restore foe's HD HP to another creature 1/rd
Path To The Grave: R30' May use Channel Divinity to inflict on target vulnerability to all damage for 1 rd
Potent Spellcasting: +4 Cleric cantrip damage
Ritual Casting: May cast spells marked with [R] using a ritual
Sentinel At Death's Door: R30' May negate a critical hit 4/long rest
